Text:
Some of the other "spreaders" now live on etorrents.org.  An open private tracker... consider this an informal invitation to come play in another sand box

Can you recommend a TV streaming appliance with wired ethernet ports?
... also, next time you're feeling generous, please consider creating a capping FAQ for those new to that game (me).

Thanks guy! I'm up in Canada and can't get the show. I've noticed you've disappeared! Please come back and upload more!!!!

Herk!
